traits.name: Dual Mind
entries: The kalashtar has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Mind Thrust
entries: The kalashtar targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10 damage) psychic damage.
